name: XOR Encoded data.
description:
XOR encodes the data with a XOR key.
Reference - https://gist.github.com/loadenmb/8254cee0f0287b896a05dcdc8a30042f

input_arguments.name: destination_url
input_arguments.description: Destination URL to post encoded data.

input_arguments.name: plaintext
input_arguments.description: Plain text mimicking victim data sent to C2 server.

input_arguments.name: key
input_arguments.description: XOR key used for encoding the plaintext.
